title: Understanding the Table
text: Look at the 'Cumulative Relative Frequency' column. This column shows the cumulative percentage of heights up to a certain range.

title: Identifying the Range
text: We need to find the percentage of heights less than $$65.95$$ inches. Check the cumulative relative frequency for the range that ends at $$65.95$$ inches.

title: Reading the Cumulative Relative Frequency
text: What is the cumulative relative frequency for the range $$63.95-65.95$$ inches?

title: Converting to Percentage
text: Convert the cumulative relative frequency $$0.23$$ to a percentage.
